basics.name: Mohamed El Mistiri
basics.label: Postdoctoral Research Scholar

location.address: Mail Stop 876106, SEMTE, Arizona State University

basics.summary: Innovative engineer and researcher with deep expertise in control systems, optimization, and intelligent system design. Passionate about integrating AI with physical systems to solve complex real-world problems. Seeking opportunities in robotics and R&D environments where I can contribute to prototyping, simulation, and cloud-integrated control solutions.

thesis.title: System Identification and Control Systems Engineering Approaches for Optimal and Practical Personalized mHealth Interventions for Physical Activity

work.name: Interactive Robotics Laboratory (IRL), Arizona State University
work.summary: Explored natural language-driven reinforcement learning; integrated LLM-based optimization with MPC; mentored graduate students on VLA model fine-tuning.
highlights: Explored natural language-driven reinforcement learning for sample-efficient policy search
Integrated LLM-based optimization with MPC for robotic arm trajectory planning
Mentored graduate students on VLA model fine-tuning and implementation for robotic applications

work.name: Control Systems Engineering Lab (CSEL), Arizona State University
work.summary: Developed and applied model-based control in multidisciplinary mHealth interventions.
highlights: Led lab efforts on multiple NIH-funded studies
Led development of closed-loop control systems for large-scale behavioral interventions
Devised signal processing and model estimation algorithms outperforming traditional methods by 15%
Designed dynamic models and 3DoF Kalman filter-based hybrid MPC algorithms for personalized control
Utilized stochastic search to optimize feature and order selection, increasing computational efficiency by 3x

work.name: Third Evolution Inc.
work.summary: Process improvement and controls engineering for water treatment plants.
highlights: Characterized production anomalies and supervised successful field implementations (doubling capacity in some cases)
Diagnosed and resolved control loop instabilities in industrial systems
Improved efficiency and reduced oscillations through control loop tuning
Created SOPs and trained operators, reducing turnaround time by 25%
Ensured compliance with EPA and safety regulations

publications.name: Prompted Policy Search: Reinforcement Learning through Linguistic and Numerical Reasoning in LLMs
Data-Driven Mobile Health: System Identification and Hybrid Model Predictive Control to Deliver Personalized Physical Activity Interventions
publications.publisher: IEEE Open Journal of Control Systems

publications.name: Data-Driven Control of Nonlinear Process Systems Using a Three-Degree-of-Freedom Model-on-Demand Model Predictive Control Framework
Understanding ‘Just-in-Time’ States in Behavioral Interventions using System Identification and Data Science Methods
3DoF-KF HMPC: A Kalman filter-based Hybrid Model Predictive Control Algorithm for Mixed Logical Dynamical Systems
System Identification and Hybrid Model Predictive Control in Personalized mHealth Interventions for Physical Activity
BayesLDM: A Domain-specific Modeling Language for Probabilistic Modeling of Longitudinal Data

projects.name: Decentralized Control: Smart Grid Optimization
projects.description: Investigated a real-time pricing algorithm for smart grid optimization; implemented dual decomposition in MATLAB; compared performance vs fixed pricing.

projects.name: Stochastic Optimization: Renewable Energy Electric Grid Optimization
projects.description: Formulated a stochastic optimization objective for renewable generation under uncertainty; implemented PH and RPH in MATLAB; RPH achieved 1.75x speedup over PH with 32 scenarios.

projects.name: NEAT Algorithm Implementation
projects.description: Collaborated on a Python repository to implement NEAT; trained networks on OpenAI control problems; documented performance vs SLP, MLP, and RNN.

projects.name: Autonomous Quadcopter Drone Landing
projects.description: Developed nonlinear control algorithms accounting for ground effect (MATLAB/Simulink); achieved 25% faster landings vs PID and eliminated damaging oscillations.

projects.name: Robotic Arm Control with LLMs
projects.description: Implemented LLM-based optimization for robotic arm trajectory planning, integrating with Model Predictive Control.

projects.name: Low Carbon Emission SMR Hydrogen Production
projects.description: Capstone project designing an efficient hydrogen production facility integrating SMR, PSA, and WGS technologies.
